conbody.p: The group menu allows you to perform certain actions to the students forming a group in the class.
Select a group tab ( ) to open the group menu.

Group menu includes following items:
Clear all calls ( )
Self listening OFF
Message to all
Poll
Autoscan
Discussion
Pairs
Press Self listening OFF button to turn off self listening mode (see ) for the students in this group. Press this button again to turn self listening back on.
Press Message to all button to deliver a spoken message to the students in this group (see ). Press this button again to exit the message to all mode.
Press the Poll button to start polling students in this group (see ). Press this button again to finish the poll.

Press Autoscan button to start covertly listening to students in the group one by one. Interval for autoscan listening can be specified in the settings menu (see ). Press this button again to exit the autoscan mode.
Press the Discussion to initiate discussion mode between students of the group (see ). Press this button again to exit discussion mode.
Press the Pairs to enter the pairing mode for the students of the group (see ), at which point pairing buttons will appear in the menu. Press the Pairs button again to exit the pairing mode.
